remarks: Value of the kernel of a functional.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lkrfval2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lkrfval2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkrval2 $p |- ( ( W e. X /\ G e. F ) -> ( K ` G ) = { x e. V | ( G ` x ) = .0. } ) $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d K x $.
$d W x $.
